build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && php artisan config:clear && php artisan route:clear && php artisan view:clear && php artisan storage:link && chmod -R 775 storage bootstrap/cache

deploy.startCommand: sleep 30 && php -r 'echo "Waiting for MySQL..."; for($i=0;$i<60;$i++){try{DB::connection()->getPdo();echo "MySQL ready!";break;}catch(Exception $e){sleep(2);}}' && php artisan migrate --force && php artisan db:seed --force && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
